1a1(nyi khri): /nyi khri ka pa bzhugs so/ /
1b1(nyi khri): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa bing sha ti sA ha sri kA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ dum bu dang po/ bam po
1b2(nyi khri): gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod
1b3(nyi khri): 'phungs po la/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/
1b4(nyi khri): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par
1b5(nyi khri): sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma
2a1(nyi khri): gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/ /dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu
2a2(nyi khri): mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma
2a3(nyi khri): med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/
2a4(nyi khri): bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo med cing
2a5(nyi khri): brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ grags pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa
2a6(nyi khri): rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba
2b1(nyi khri): rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam
2b2(nyi khri): shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ sngon du smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mtha'
2b3(nyi khri): yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig
2b4(nyi khri): yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum ba med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos
2b5(nyi khri): pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang
2b6(nyi khri): ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la
2b7(nyi khri): mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang /
3a1(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa/ chos
3a2(nyi khri): kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams
3a3(nyi khri): grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas
3a4(nyi khri): pa/ sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha'
3a5(nyi khri): yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / rin chen snying po dang / rin chen byin pa dang / ded dpon dam pa dang / skyes bus
3a6(nyi khri): byin dang / skyob sbed dang / chu bdag lha dang / dbang pos byin dang / bzang po'i stobs dang / blo gros dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel ba dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / don yod mthong ba dang / sgrib med blo gros dang /
3a7(nyi khri): rab tu zhugs pa dang / mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / rtag tu brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / mi gtong brtson pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / blo gros dpe med pa dang / spyan ras
3b1(nyi khri): gzigs kyi dbang po dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / snying rje cher sems dang / rgyan chen
3b2(nyi khri): po dang / rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /
3b3(nyi khri): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang /
3b4(nyi khri): khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi spyan
3b5(nyi khri): gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/ /de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung
3b6(nyi khri): ngo / /zhabs gnyis kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang / zhabs byin pa gnyis dang / zhabs pus mo gnyis dang / zhabs brla gnyis dang / sku sta zur gnyis dang / sku lte ba'i
3b7(nyi khri): dkyil 'khor dang / sku rtsib logs gnyis dang / thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /
4a1(nyi khri): de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang / sku phrag pa gnyis dang / mgur dang / tshems mche ba bzhi dang / tshems bzhi bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / snyan gnyis dang / shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang /
4a2(nyi khri): steng gi spyi gtsug dang / zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba chen pos
4a3(nyi khri): khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig
4a4(nyi khri): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /
4a5(nyi khri): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi
4a6(nyi khri): bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos
4a7(nyi khri): khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
4b1(nyi khri): rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang
4b2(nyi khri): shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des
4b3(nyi khri): gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
4b4(nyi khri): 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/ 'od zer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po/ rin po che sna
4b5(nyi khri): tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas
4b6(nyi khri): gnas par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
4b7(nyi khri): gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su
5a1(nyi khri): phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can gang gis
5a2(nyi khri): chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par
5a3(nyi khri): rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu
5a4(nyi khri): g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go /rab tu ldeg go /kun tu ldeg go /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du 'ur 'ur ro/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /kun du
5a5(nyi khri): shig shig go / shar mtho na ni nub dma'/ nub mtho na ni shar dma'/ byang mtho na ni lho dma'/ lho mtho na ni byang dma'/ mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams
5a6(nyi khri): cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang /
5a7(nyi khri): ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang / mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /
5b1(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha de dag dang / mi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe
5b2(nyi khri): rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
5b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing
5b4(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang
5b5(nyi khri): mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag /
5b6(nyi khri): rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
5b7(nyi khri): rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /'on pa rnams kyang rna bas
6a1(nyi khri): sgra thos par gyur to/ /smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/ /sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to/ /gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur
6a2(nyi khri): to/ /bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to/ /skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to/ /lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /ngal ba rnams
6a3(nyi khri): kyang ngal sos par gyur te/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la/
6a4(nyi khri): dper na pha dang / ma dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' ba dang / gnyen pa dang / grogs po dang / mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba
6a5(nyi khri): dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtogs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde
6a6(nyi khri): ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o/ /zhi ba ni dge ba'o/ /dul ba ni dge ba'o/ /sdom pa ni dge ba'o/ /bden pa ni dge ba'o/ /bag byed pa ni dge
6a7(nyi khri): ba'o/ /byams pa ni dge ba'o/ /snying rje ni dge ba'o/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ni dge ba'o/ /srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba 'di ni dge ba'o/ /zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs
6b1(nyi khri): pas 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/ zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i
6b2(nyi khri): gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang dpal
6b3(nyi khri): gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang
6b4(nyi khri): nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang
6b5(nyi khri): shar lho dang / lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me
6b6(nyi khri): lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad
6b7(nyi khri): zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs
7a1(nyi khri): bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing /
7a2(nyi khri): lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
7a3(nyi khri): khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe ma dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de thams
7a4(nyi khri): cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
7a5(nyi khri): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ut+pal dang / pad mo dang / ku mud dang / pun da ri ka dang / na li na dang / sau gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ge sar dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na
7a6(nyi khri): bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / byug spos dang / ut+pal dang / pad
7a7(nyi khri): mo dang / ku mud dang / pun da ri ka dang / na li na dang / sau gan d+hi dang / me tog ge sar dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor
7b1(nyi khri): to/ mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po
7b2(nyi khri): khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sogs pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
7b3(nyi khri): ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du
7b4(nyi khri): red de gnas par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/ /mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to/ /rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to/ /me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong
7b5(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin tu mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin
7b6(nyi khri): du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang
7b7(nyi khri): steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa
8a1(nyi khri): mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / shar gyi
8a2(nyi khri): lus 'phags po dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang / de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
8a3(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /de nas
8a4(nyi khri): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/ 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs dang / lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang
8a5(nyi khri): shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang
8a6(nyi khri): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
8a7(nyi khri): 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan
8b1(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang
8b2(nyi khri): shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
8b3(nyi khri): khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas
8b4(nyi khri): shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas
8b5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
8b6(nyi khri): 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
8b7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di
9a1(nyi khri): ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
9a2(nyi khri): chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
9a3(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
9a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
9a5(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig
9a6(nyi khri): pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab
9a7(nyi khri): par shes na song shig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong
9b1(nyi khri): bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/
9b2(nyi khri): bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la
9b3(nyi khri): pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur
9b4(nyi khri): ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong
9b5(nyi khri): dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom
9b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba
9b7(nyi khri): dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der
10a1(nyi khri): dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom
10a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde
10a3(nyi khri): 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
10a4(nyi khri): mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
10a5(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug
10a6(nyi khri): po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu
10a7(nyi khri): mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa
10b1(nyi khri): byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
10b2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi
10b3(nyi khri): khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
10b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di
10b5(nyi khri): lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang
10b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
10b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /
11a1(nyi khri): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom
11a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so
11a3(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab
11a4(nyi khri): par shes na song shig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu
11a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste
11a6(nyi khri): pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /zhes gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
11a7(nyi khri): zhing der bag yod par spyod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med
11b1(nyi khri): pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang
11b2(nyi khri): bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng
11b3(nyi khri): ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom
11b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub
11b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/
11b6(nyi khri): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom
11b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to/ /
12a1(nyi khri): de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos
12a2(nyi khri): bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang
12a3(nyi khri): rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas nub
12a4(nyi khri): phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs
12a5(nyi khri): shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug
12a6(nyi khri): 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song
12a7(nyi khri): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di
12b1(nyi khri): ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
12b2(nyi khri): klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
12b3(nyi khri): rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
12b4(nyi khri): 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12b5(nyi khri): chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
12b6(nyi khri): gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/ pad mo rin po che sna
12b7(nyi khri): tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ /
13a1(nyi khri): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
13a2(nyi khri): rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang
13a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
13a4(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag
13a5(nyi khri): khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa
13a6(nyi khri): dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/
13a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu
13b1(nyi khri): 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od
13b2(nyi khri): 'phro bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan
13b3(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
13b4(nyi khri): snyed po de dag gi / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ /pad mo de dag la de bzhin
13b5(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
13b6(nyi khri): gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
13b7(nyi khri): shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi
14a1(nyi khri): khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
14a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs
14a3(nyi khri): pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la
14a4(nyi khri): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de
14a5(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
14a6(nyi khri): gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
14a7(nyi khri): ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi
14b1(nyi khri): khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang
14b2(nyi khri): phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal
14b3(nyi khri): ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las
14b4(nyi khri): byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma
14b5(nyi khri): mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan
14b6(nyi khri): 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
14b7(nyi khri): de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po
15a1(nyi khri): de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi
15a2(nyi khri): zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
15a3(nyi khri): dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
15a4(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas
15a5(nyi khri): byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa
15a6(nyi khri): ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/
15a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
15b1(nyi khri): 'das gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos
15b2(nyi khri): ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug
15b3(nyi khri): pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas
15b4(nyi khri): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
15b5(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad
15b6(nyi khri): do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog
15b7(nyi khri): mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting
16a1(nyi khri): nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu
16a2(nyi khri): gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad
16a3(nyi khri): ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
16a4(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16a5(nyi khri): chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de
16a6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang /
16a7(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
16b1(nyi khri): kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems
16b2(nyi khri): dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
16b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di
16b4(nyi khri): dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la bag yod
16b5(nyi khri): par spyod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal
16b6(nyi khri): bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang
16b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
17a1(nyi khri): gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba
17a2(nyi khri): dang bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba
17a3(nyi khri): der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan
17a4(nyi khri): 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog
17a5(nyi khri): bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan
17a6(nyi khri): 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi /de bzhin gshegs pa
17a7(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di
17b1(nyi khri): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang
17b2(nyi khri): rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/
17b3(nyi khri): bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba
17b4(nyi khri): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang
17b5(nyi khri): dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes
17b6(nyi khri): pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces
17b7(nyi khri): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
18a1(nyi khri): gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
18a2(nyi khri): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa'
18a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal la
18a4(nyi khri): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun
18a5(nyi khri): kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das pad mo dam
18a6(nyi khri): pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la/ pad mo rin po che sna
18a7(nyi khri): tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la bcom ldan 'das snyun mi
18b1(nyi khri): mnga'a'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo
18b2(nyi khri): dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i
18b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
18b4(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
18b5(nyi khri): dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye
18b6(nyi khri): ma dang na bza' dang / rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/
18b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu
19a1(nyi khri): 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
19a2(nyi khri): pad mo dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'a'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag
19a3(nyi khri): kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
19a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
19a5(nyi khri): dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las
19a6(nyi khri): brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u
19a7(nyi khri): dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti
19b1(nyi khri): stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de
19b2(nyi khri): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
19b3(nyi khri): 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
19b4(nyi khri): sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19b5(nyi khri): gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba
19b6(nyi khri): 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
19b7(nyi khri): po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
20a1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston
20a2(nyi khri): te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten
20a3(nyi khri): gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
20a4(nyi khri): kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
20a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
20a6(nyi khri): snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das
20a7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam
20b1(nyi khri): zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis
20b2(nyi khri): gtor cig / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/
20b3(nyi khri): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi
20b4(nyi khri): mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/
20b5(nyi khri): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang / rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /
20b6(nyi khri): ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
20b7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

21a7(nyi khri): gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /

21b5(nyi khri): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen

22a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom
22a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa
22a3(nyi khri): gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/

22a5(nyi khri): tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun
22a6(nyi khri): mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
22a7(nyi khri): pa gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der
22b1(nyi khri): skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
22b2(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag
22b3(nyi khri): khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang bdug
22b4(nyi khri): spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub
22b5(nyi khri): sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
22b6(nyi khri): tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22b7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod ngam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can
23a1(nyi khri): 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de
23a2(nyi khri): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin
23a3(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po
23a4(nyi khri): bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang
23a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim
23a6(nyi khri): gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo
23a7(nyi khri): zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
23b1(nyi khri): nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi
23b2(nyi khri): shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
23b3(nyi khri): rgyas pad mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba
23b4(nyi khri): dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas steng gi
23b5(nyi khri): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong
23b6(nyi khri): ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
23b7(nyi khri): pa pad mo'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la
24a1(nyi khri): phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang
24a2(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas de
24a3(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma
24a4(nyi khri): stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/
24a5(nyi khri): sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad
24a6(nyi khri): du bskur ro/ /zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
24a7(nyi khri): mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de las/
24b1(nyi khri): pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar
24b2(nyi khri): gyur nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag
24b3(nyi khri): gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/
24b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/
