147a3(nyi khri): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha' rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji
147a4(nyi khri): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang
147a5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /
147a6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
147a7(nyi khri): rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi/ rang bzhin med pa dang / khams rnams la khams kyi rang
147b1(nyi khri): bzhin med pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /tshor
147b2(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ /skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid
147b3(nyi khri): med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid med do/ /mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/ /mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
147b4(nyi khri): bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
147b5(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis
147b6(nyi khri): stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/
147b7(nyi khri): de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar
148a1(nyi khri): gyur pa de lta de ltar/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag
148a2(nyi khri): pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g.yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang
148a3(nyi khri): ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi
148a4(nyi khri): skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ khor zug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed
148a5(nyi khri): cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang
148a6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi btang bar spyad par byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
148a7(nyi khri): la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
148b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gal te
148b2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/
148b3(nyi khri): mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na
148b4(nyi khri): mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
148b5(nyi khri): par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs
148b6(nyi khri): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
148b7(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te
149a1(nyi khri): gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
149a2(nyi khri): la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
149a3(nyi khri): mkhas pas/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams
149a4(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon bar
149a5(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang /
149a6(nyi khri): bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang / dben ba dang / mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
149a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do zhes bgyi bar spyod na dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das
149b1(nyi khri): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs
149b2(nyi khri): mi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
149b3(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba
149b4(nyi khri): dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
149b5(nyi khri): par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /
149b6(nyi khri): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba
149b7(nyi khri): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te
150a1(nyi khri): byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes
150a2(nyi khri): te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te
150a3(nyi khri): byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes
150a4(nyi khri): te byin gyis rlob/ ma rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang len pa dang / srid pa dang skye ba dang / rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis
150a5(nyi khri): rlob/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba
150a6(nyi khri): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
150a7(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlobs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
150b1(nyi khri): pa brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar
150b2(nyi khri): brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yang mngon du bya ba'i skal pa med na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/ /
150b3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar
150b4(nyi khri): spyod na thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la
150b5(nyi khri): yang mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / gzugs sdug bsngal
150b6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs
150b7(nyi khri): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar
151a1(nyi khri): mi spyod/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod
151a2(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
151a3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
151a4(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid
151a5(nyi khri): kyang stong pa nyid do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
151a6(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge
151a7(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang
151b1(nyi khri): yin pa de yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
151b2(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ tshe dang
151b3(nyi khri): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do/ /de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya
151b4(nyi khri): bar mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi spyod pa 'ang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems
151b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar
151b6(nyi khri): yang mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
151b7(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi
152a1(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /spyod pa 'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa 'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
152a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gal te sems ma zhum/ kun tu ma zhum/ mi skrag /kun tu mi skrag /kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
152a3(nyi khri): nyid dang nye bar gyur par rig par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ gnyis su med gnyis su byar med do/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes
152a4(nyi khri): bya ba ste/ rgya che ba mchog tu bya ba tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
152a5(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/ 'on te de lta bu'i ting nge
152a6(nyi khri): 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
152a7(nyi khri): 'gyur ba yod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
152b1(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
152b2(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
152b3(nyi khri): do/ /chos thams cad las shin du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
152b4(nyi khri): do/ /nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
152b5(nyi khri): 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshig
152b6(nyi khri): la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad yang dag
152b7(nyi khri): par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dbang po'i dpal
153a1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
153a2(nyi khri): yod do/ /rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
153a3(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do/ /'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
153a4(nyi khri): dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad pa dang
153a5(nyi khri): bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /shes rab sgron ma
153a6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
153a7(nyi khri): yod do/ /sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
153b1(nyi khri): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa
153b2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa
153b3(nyi khri): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
153b4(nyi khri): g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing
153b5(nyi khri): gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes
153b6(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa
153b7(nyi khri): mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /brda dang sgra
154a1(nyi khri): la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mngon par dmigs
154a2(nyi khri): pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
154a3(nyi khri): yod do/ /gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'thun pa
154a4(nyi khri): dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
154a5(nyi khri): yod do/ /rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
154a6(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
154a7(nyi khri): do/ /de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bas rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
154b1(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
154b2(nyi khri): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
154b3(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
154b4(nyi khri): ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod de/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa de ni sngon
154b5(nyi khri): gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
154b6(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni
154b7(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go /bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/ /bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par
155a1(nyi khri): gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/ de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi rgyu'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
155a2(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan
155a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting
155a4(nyi khri): nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin
155a5(nyi khri): yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su
155a6(nyi khri): byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge
155a7(nyi khri): 'dzin de la rtog pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do/ /'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing / 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor
155b1(nyi khri): gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med do/ /'du shes su 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste rab 'byor legs
155b2(nyi khri): so legs so/ /tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do/ /ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /
155b3(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
155b4(nyi khri): brgyad kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po/ /
155b5(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas
155b6(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam
155b7(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
156a1(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi
156a2(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang /
156a3(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin
156a4(nyi khri): du rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol du phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
156a5(nyi khri): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
156a6(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
156a7(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /
156b1(nyi khri): shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/ /shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
156b2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang
156b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
156b4(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang slob pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/
156b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir med ces bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa de la
156b6(nyi khri): mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa na nga stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
156b7(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos
157a1(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/ srid pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di lta ste/
157a2(nyi khri): chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen cing / sangs rgyas kyi
157a3(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to/ /de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo / /ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
157a4(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi
157a5(nyi khri): shes mi mthong ngo / /de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i
157a6(nyi khri): khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis
157a7(nyi khri): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
157b1(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni mngon par zhen pa ma yin
157b2(nyi khri): te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
157b3(nyi khri): yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi
157b4(nyi khri): bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/
157b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i
157b6(nyi khri): slad du byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
157b7(nyi khri): mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
158a1(nyi khri): du phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
158a2(nyi khri): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar
158a3(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
158a4(nyi khri): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
158a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnam
158a6(nyi khri): pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
158a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin
158b1(nyi khri): no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
158b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
158b3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /
158b4(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
158b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
158b6(nyi khri): skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/
158b7(nyi khri): ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
159a1(nyi khri): ram/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa
159a2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la
159a3(nyi khri): dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig / rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam
159a4(nyi khri): 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma
159a5(nyi khri): yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
159a6(nyi khri): zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan
159a7(nyi khri): la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
159b1(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
159b2(nyi khri): ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi
159b3(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
159b4(nyi khri): brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
159b5(nyi khri): snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
159b6(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/
159b7(nyi khri): sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
160a1(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so/ /
160a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /
160a3(nyi khri): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mig gi
160a4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
160a5(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang
160a6(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
160a7(nyi khri): ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
160b1(nyi khri): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
160b2(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
160b3(nyi khri): pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba'am/
160b4(nyi khri): 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so
160b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
160b6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
160b7(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
161a1(nyi khri): 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar la/
161a2(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du
161a3(nyi khri): shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar la skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/
161a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med
161a5(nyi khri): pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi pha
161a6(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang
161a7(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi par dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
161b1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul
161b2(nyi khri): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa
161b3(nyi khri): ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
161b4(nyi khri): phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i
161b5(nyi khri): rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
161b6(nyi khri): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
161b7(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
162a1(nyi khri): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig
162a2(nyi khri): yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom
162a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go /de ni
162a4(nyi khri): phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang /
162a5(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta
162a6(nyi khri): bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go /de ni phung po lnga'o
162a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
162b1(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/
162b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sngang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang
162b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing dngang ba dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro/ /
162b4(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs/ mi dang mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
162b5(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
162b6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
162b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/
163a1(nyi khri): de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/
163a2(nyi khri): de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam
163a3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
163a4(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
163a5(nyi khri): pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
163a6(nyi khri): kyis/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
163a7(nyi khri): pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
163b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam
163b2(nyi khri): par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad
163b3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams
163b4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam
163b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa
163b6(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams
163b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs
164a1(nyi khri): so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam
164a2(nyi khri): par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par/ rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
164a3(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
164a4(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
164a5(nyi khri): chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan
164a6(nyi khri): to/ /gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
164a7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
164b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs/ mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
164b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba dang /
164b3(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
164b4(nyi khri): stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang /
164b5(nyi khri): bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
164b6(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
164b7(nyi khri): tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /
165a1(nyi khri): dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang / mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang / skrag par
165a2(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog
165a3(nyi khri): go / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
165a4(nyi khri): smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces
165a5(nyi khri): bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
165a6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi gtong zhing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs/ mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur
165a7(nyi khri): ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang
165b1(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan
165b2(nyi khri): ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba
165b3(nyi khri): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces
165b4(nyi khri): bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub
165b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/
165b6(nyi khri): bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs
165b7(nyi khri): stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid
166a1(nyi khri): kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig go /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/
166a2(nyi khri): yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos
166a3(nyi khri): stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /
166a4(nyi khri): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /
166a5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
166a6(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /
166a7(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i
166b1(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid
166b2(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar
166b3(nyi khri): gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
166b4(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
166b5(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes
166b6(nyi khri): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
166b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang / de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
167a1(nyi khri): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
167a2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
167a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar/ de mi dmigs
