167a4(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya
167a5(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang /
167a6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
167a7(nyi khri): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar/ de mi dmigs pa'i
167b1(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
167b2(nyi khri): gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
167b3(nyi khri): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
167b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig sdug bsngal zhes
167b5(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang /
167b6(nyi khri): lce dang / lus dang / yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
167b7(nyi khri): pa dang / mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
168a1(nyi khri): dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
168a2(nyi khri): yid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
168a3(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
168a4(nyi khri): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
168a5(nyi khri): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
168a6(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
168a7(nyi khri): ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos bdag
168b1(nyi khri): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya
168b2(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang /
168b3(nyi khri): ro dang / reg dang / chos mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
168b4(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
168b5(nyi khri): gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
168b6(nyi khri): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
168b7(nyi khri): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
169a1(nyi khri): dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
169a2(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam

169a4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i

169b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
169b7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
170a1(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
170a2(nyi khri): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /

170b3(nyi khri): te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus
170b4(nyi khri): te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

170b7(nyi khri): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
171a1(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
171a2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung

171b1(nyi khri): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i

171b6(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te
171b7(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
172a1(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
172a2(nyi khri): ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya
172a3(nyi khri): ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
172a4(nyi khri): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
172a5(nyi khri): dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
172a6(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi
172a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
172b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi sngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
172b2(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur zhing / thabs mi mkhas te/ sdig pa'i
172b3(nyi khri): grogs po'i sug par lhung zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
172b4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin
172b5(nyi khri): pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems
172b6(nyi khri): su byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/
172b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
173a1(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
173a2(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos
173a3(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang dmigs la/ stong
173a4(nyi khri): pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba dang sna dang /
173a5(nyi khri): lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/
173a6(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes
173a7(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
173b1(nyi khri): byed/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yang yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos
173b2(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa
173b3(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang
173b4(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs
173b5(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa
173b6(nyi khri): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna
173b7(nyi khri): ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa/
174a1(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang
174a2(nyi khri): dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi
174a3(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
174a4(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
174a5(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul
174a6(nyi khri): gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /sa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya
174a7(nyi khri): bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
174b1(nyi khri): khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par
174b2(nyi khri): shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa na nga stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngos
174b3(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid
174b4(nyi khri): ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi
174b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes
174b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag
174b7(nyi khri): gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang
175a1(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
175a2(nyi khri): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
175a3(nyi khri): 'dres pa brgyad bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
175a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
175a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la
175a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
175a7(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/
175b1(nyi khri): 'di ni bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan
175b2(nyi khri): la bstan par mi bya'o/ /zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig
175b3(nyi khri): to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol du phyin pa drug las zlog cing / mos pa med par byed de rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam
175b4(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha
175b5(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo / /zhes bdud kyi las mi ston bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di dag ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can
175b6(nyi khri): dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gling gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das
175b7(nyi khri): pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin du rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa dag ston to/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /yongs su ston to/ /zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston
176a1(nyi khri): pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/
176a2(nyi khri): 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so/ /zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi
176a3(nyi khri): smra mi ston pa ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu
176a4(nyi khri): mig gi bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par
176a5(nyi khri): shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam
176a6(nyi khri): bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis
176a7(nyi khri): stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag
176b1(nyi khri): gis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du
176b2(nyi khri): phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
176b3(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi
176b4(nyi khri): cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/ /
176b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
176b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
176b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
177a1(nyi khri): las zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems pa dang / rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig
177a2(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
177a3(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
177a4(nyi khri): lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
177a5(nyi khri): byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang
177a6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rkang lag dang mgo bcad
177a7(nyi khri): pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon
177b1(nyi khri): du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub
177b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya
177b3(nyi khri): ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong
177b4(nyi khri): pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
177b5(nyi khri): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang /
177b6(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan
177b7(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang /
178a1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
178a2(nyi khri): stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
178a3(nyi khri): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi
178a4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg
178a5(nyi khri): pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
178a6(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
178a7(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
178b1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
178b2(nyi khri): ston pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston
178b3(nyi khri): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i
178b4(nyi khri): tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i 'dud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po dag rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas
178b5(nyi khri): kyang yongs su spong bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
178b6(nyi khri): dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
178b7(nyi khri): kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor byang chub la yang tshig med/ sems can la yang tshig med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don med pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med do/ /rab
179a1(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma la gnas med do/ /
179a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na chu zla dang sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan
179a3(nyi khri): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul ba la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
179a4(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor
179a5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
179a6(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la gnas med do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
179a7(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
179b1(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par
179b2(nyi khri): shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste
179b3(nyi khri): dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
179b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
179b5(nyi khri): ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
179b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i ma rig pa la gnas med do/ /'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched
179b7(nyi khri): drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /
180a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
180a2(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// //
180a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /dngos po med
180a4(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dran pa nye
180a5(nyi khri): bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
180a6(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
180a7(nyi khri): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
180b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/
180b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang /
180b3(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
180b4(nyi khri): don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
180b5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na yid
180b6(nyi khri): de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
180b7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
181a1(nyi khri): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
181a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /
181a3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
181a4(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes
181a5(nyi khri): pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
181a6(nyi khri): kyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /
181a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /
181b1(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
181b2(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
181b3(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
181b4(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/
181b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ ma rig pa la
181b6(nyi khri): gnas med do de ci'i phyir zhe na ma rig pa de med pa'i phyir te rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
181b7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na rga shi de med pa'i phyir te/ rab
182a1(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
182a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
182a3(nyi khri): gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa
182a4(nyi khri): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /
182a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
182a6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
182a7(nyi khri): na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
182b1(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
182b2(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
182b3(nyi khri): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
182b4(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do/ /'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
182b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang
182b6(nyi khri): 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa
182b7(nyi khri): la gnas ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang gi mi dmigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/
183a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba
183a2(nyi khri): med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba med pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon
183a3(nyi khri): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'byung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel
183a4(nyi khri): par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la/
183a5(nyi khri): gnas med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
183a6(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so
183a7(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang
183b1(nyi khri): 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin
183b2(nyi khri): du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
183b3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
183b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar du shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
183b5(nyi khri): kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
183b6(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin du
183b7(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin du
184a1(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong
184a2(nyi khri): ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab
184a3(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas med do/ /rab
184a4(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do/ /
184a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
184a6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi tshul khrims la/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de
184a7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
184b1(nyi khri): don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la/ shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
184b2(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la/ rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
184b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
184b4(nyi khri): gzigs pa la/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
184b5(nyi khri): nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang /
184b6(nyi khri): glog gi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med
184b7(nyi khri): do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med
185a1(nyi khri): do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
185a2(nyi khri): 'od la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
185a3(nyi khri): med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/
185a4(nyi khri): thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
185a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med par yang rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang rnams kyi ma chags pa dang
185a6(nyi khri): mchis pa ma lags pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni gang rnams rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du bstan pa dang /
185a7(nyi khri): lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/
185b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po
185b2(nyi khri): de dag nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/
185b3(nyi khri): rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las
185b4(nyi khri): kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par
185b5(nyi khri): 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs
185b6(nyi khri): rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes
185b7(nyi khri): su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab
186a1(nyi khri): 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang /
186a2(nyi khri): log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
186a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /
186a4(nyi khri): dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de
186a5(nyi khri): dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / dge ba
186a6(nyi khri): bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par/ de ma yin par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag
186a7(nyi khri): ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
186b1(nyi khri): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma shes pa
186b2(nyi khri): yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa
186b3(nyi khri): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pa gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar ba dang po'o/ /
186b4(nyi khri): nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar ba gnyis pa'o/ /sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par
186b5(nyi khri): gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
186b6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye
186b7(nyi khri): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam
187a1(nyi khri): pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /rnam par thar ba brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas
187a2(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs
187a3(nyi khri): te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la
187a4(nyi khri): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes
187a5(nyi khri): brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/ btang
187a6(nyi khri): snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed
187a7(nyi khri): pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye
187b1(nyi khri): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las
187b2(nyi khri): yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ltar mthar gyis
187b3(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
187b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/
187b5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa
187b6(nyi khri): ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
187b7(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
188a1(nyi khri): sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos
188a2(nyi khri): zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma
188a3(nyi khri): yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos rnams/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
188a4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
188a5(nyi khri): nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
188a6(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/
188a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong
188b1(nyi khri): ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas/ chags par mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa
188b2(nyi khri): med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i
188b3(nyi khri): slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/
188b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi
188b5(nyi khri): phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyis dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la
188b6(nyi khri): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo
188b7(nyi khri): rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
189a1(nyi khri): 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la
189a2(nyi khri): sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan
189a3(nyi khri): las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o/ /bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad
189a4(nyi khri): kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis phung po nas brtsams te pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
189a5(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar bsgrub pa khong du chud pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa
189a6(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges
189a7(nyi khri): pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug
189b1(nyi khri): bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang du 'di ltar sems bskyed par
