189b2(nyi khri): bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag
189b3(nyi khri): kyang / bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug
189b4(nyi khri): bsngal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
189b5(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi
189b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems
189b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
190a1(nyi khri): sems kyang mi bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan
190a2(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi
190a3(nyi khri): byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can
190a4(nyi khri): thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni/ sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med
190a5(nyi khri): pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
190a6(nyi khri): pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la mos par bya'o/ /chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa
190a7(nyi khri): gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon
190b1(nyi khri): tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
190b2(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi
190b3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
190b4(nyi khri): la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
190b5(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
190b6(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
190b7(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
191a1(nyi khri): 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
191a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
191a3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la spobs pa skyed cig /sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed can dang / shed bdag
191a4(nyi khri): dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar
191a5(nyi khri): lta ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs
191a6(nyi khri): rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid kyang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad
191a7(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar
191b1(nyi khri): 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
191b2(nyi khri): du phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye mched dang /
191b3(nyi khri): khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
191b4(nyi khri): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par
191b5(nyi khri): dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de
191b6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du
191b7(nyi khri): dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs
192a1(nyi khri): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
192a2(nyi khri): ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
192a3(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags
192a4(nyi khri): pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni/ zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad
192a5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de
192a6(nyi khri): ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems ma mchis pa de la yang chags pa ma mchis so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
192a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192b1(nyi khri): sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
192b2(nyi khri): ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la/ nyan thos kyi sems med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /
192b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
192b4(nyi khri): cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud pa med pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang
192b5(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/
192b6(nyi khri): gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa
192b7(nyi khri): med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med
193a1(nyi khri): cing / khongs su chud pa med de zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang mi zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan
193a2(nyi khri): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de yin te tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo
193a3(nyi khri): rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
193a4(nyi khri): thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
193a5(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
193a6(nyi khri): yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
193a7(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
193b1(nyi khri): kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma
193b2(nyi khri): zad de/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
193b3(nyi khri): chos rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags
193b4(nyi khri): pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /
193b5(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad
193b6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
193b7(nyi khri): sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
194a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la/ bdag kyang spobs pa
194a2(nyi khri): skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems
194a3(nyi khri): can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
194a4(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol
194a5(nyi khri): du phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul
194a6(nyi khri): khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams
194a7(nyi khri): cad kyi don tu bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
194b1(nyi khri): cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan skyed do/ /
194b2(nyi khri): sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
194b3(nyi khri): sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di
194b4(nyi khri): snyed ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don tu go cha chen po gyon to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su
194b5(nyi khri): rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab
194b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
194b7(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
195a1(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
195a2(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems skyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang
195a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
195a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
195a5(nyi khri): thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
195a6(nyi khri): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
195a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag
195b1(nyi khri): la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
195b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su
195b3(nyi khri): gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse
195b4(nyi khri): gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/
195b5(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams
195b6(nyi khri): cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs par/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi
195b7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems
196a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
196a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /
196a3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
196a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
196a5(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi skyed na so so'i skye bo'i sa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha
196a6(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni
196a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul
196b1(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
196b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
196b3(nyi khri): thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
196b4(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes
196b5(nyi khri): nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/
196b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol du
196b7(nyi khri): phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
197a1(nyi khri): bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo
197a2(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang
197a3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
197a4(nyi khri): yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la
197a5(nyi khri): spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan
197a6(nyi khri): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par
197a7(nyi khri): mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
197b1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
197b2(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
197b3(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa la mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
197b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing /
197b5(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
197b6(nyi khri): spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang
197b7(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
198a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de
198a2(nyi khri): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang
198a3(nyi khri): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la
198a4(nyi khri): de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
198a5(nyi khri): po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing brtun mi
198a6(nyi khri): ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
198a7(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
198b1(nyi khri): phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad la
198b2(nyi khri): sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
198b3(nyi khri): sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
198b4(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /
198b5(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin
198b6(nyi khri): pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin
198b7(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
199a1(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
199a2(nyi khri): po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
199a3(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/
199a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
199a5(nyi khri): pa'i yid bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang
199a6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
199a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la/ sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing
199b1(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /
199b2(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs
199b3(nyi khri): te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go
199b4(nyi khri): cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub
199b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
199b6(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
199b7(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
200a1(nyi khri): la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/
200a2(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
200a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la gnas shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
200a4(nyi khri): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
200a5(nyi khri): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de
200a6(nyi khri): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang
200a7(nyi khri): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig
200b1(nyi khri): tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du
200b2(nyi khri): phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma
200b3(nyi khri): yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/
200b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/
200b5(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
200b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol du phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
200b7(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa de dag gis kyang mi
201a1(nyi khri): 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/
201a2(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
201a3(nyi khri): dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
201a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
201a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
201a6(nyi khri): na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su
201a7(nyi khri): smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad de/ dbyangs rjes su sgrog go /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la
201b1(nyi khri): yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha
201b2(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis
201b3(nyi khri): pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas/
201b4(nyi khri): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/
201b5(nyi khri): mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam
201b6(nyi khri): par spyod do/ /de tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin
201b7(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems
202a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad
202a2(nyi khri): med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /
202a3(nyi khri): snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin du yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
202a4(nyi khri): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang
202a5(nyi khri): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye
202a6(nyi khri): mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen
202a7(nyi khri): po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la rjod cing / 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang / de
202b1(nyi khri): dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/ bsam
202b2(nyi khri): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
202b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyams pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
202b4(nyi khri): gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to snyam du sems shing / yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
202b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
202b6(nyi khri): rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
202b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi
203a1(nyi khri): ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag
203a2(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon
203a3(nyi khri): pa med pa'i rnam pa rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
203a4(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
203a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
203a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
203a7(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa ste/ tshe dang
203b1(nyi khri): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad
203b2(nyi khri): yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes/ de la gzhol bar byed do/ /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/ /dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can
203b3(nyi khri): thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/ /btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la
203b4(nyi khri): spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs
203b5(nyi khri): par nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
203b6(nyi khri): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/
203b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge
204a1(nyi khri): ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa'
204a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar
204a3(nyi khri): byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
204a4(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa
204a5(nyi khri): dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i
204a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po na/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang /
204a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
204b1(nyi khri): chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing / mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
204b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bas shes pa mi 'jug /mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med
204b3(nyi khri): pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
204b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dus gsum la ye shes mi 'jug pa
204b5(nyi khri): 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par
204b6(nyi khri): mi byed/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang / de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems
204b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ zag pa dang
205a1(nyi khri): bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med
205a2(nyi khri): pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/
205a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par
205a4(nyi khri): gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
205a5(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
205a6(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos
205a7(nyi khri): kyang mi dmigs shing / shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
205b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
205b2(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
205b3(nyi khri): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
205b4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs
205b5(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
205b6(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /rnam
205b7(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
206a1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
206a2(nyi khri): 'dres pa brgyad sgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub
206a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
206a4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yid ces
206a5(nyi khri): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes
206a6(nyi khri): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes
206a7(nyi khri): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong
206b1(nyi khri): pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
206b2(nyi khri): chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
206b3(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
206b4(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin
206b5(nyi khri): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub dmigs
206b6(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
206b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
207a1(nyi khri): par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang /
207a2(nyi khri): bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de byang chub sems
207a3(nyi khri): dpa'i theg pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung /
207a4(nyi khri): sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes
207a5(nyi khri): thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa de dang nam du yang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
207a6(nyi khri): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs
207a7(nyi khri): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg
207b1(nyi khri): pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do/ /zhes grags pa sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /
207b2(nyi khri): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che
207b3(nyi khri): ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
207b4(nyi khri): bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
207b5(nyi khri): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so/ /go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
207b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha chen po gyon cing / 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin
207b7(nyi khri): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/
208a1(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/
208a2(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
208a3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/
208a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs
208a5(nyi khri): dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu
208a6(nyi khri): skyod de/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /
208a7(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu skyod do/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
208b1(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang / bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang / bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam
208b2(nyi khri): par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o/ /de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i
208b3(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /rab
208b4(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par
208b5(nyi khri): sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song
208b6(nyi khri): gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
208b7(nyi khri): 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i
209a1(nyi khri): sems can rnams/ ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang / sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis/ de bzhin pa'i
209a2(nyi khri): phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
209a3(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba/ mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar bai DUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi
209a4(nyi khri): sbyin pa byed do/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog /phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ mal cha
209a5(nyi khri): 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la/ rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel
209a6(nyi khri): dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / baiDUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/
209a7(nyi khri): mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma
209b1(nyi khri): rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i
209b2(nyi khri): tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa/
